item.title: Astronomers capture a violent super-eruption from a young sun
item.description: Astronomers observed a massive, multi-temperature plasma eruption from a young Sun-like star, revealing how early solar explosions could shape planets...

item.title: Scientists stunned as island spider loses half its genome

item.title: Alzheimer’s might be powered by a broken sleep-wake cycle

item.title: A gene from 100-year-olds could help kids who age too fast

item.title: Breakthrough blood test finally confirms Chronic Fatigue Syndrome
item.description: A team of scientists has developed a highly accurate blood test for Chronic Fatigue Syndrome. The test reads tiny DNA patterns that reveal the biologi...
